programme.title: Guy's Ranch Kitchen
programme.desc: At the ranch, Guy Fieri wants to stretch it out; Chef Stephanie Izard pours a Poblano Mezquila Julep; Chef Maneet Chauhan makes Beef Keema Vindaloo.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, a late-night spot serves breakfast with a twist, like drunken French toast; in Columbus, Ohio, a funky joint serves creative combos like brisket on corn cakes; in Phoenix, a barbecue stop smokes up prime rib and pork belly dumplings.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Chicken caesar sandwiches and fajitas in Syracuse; fisherman's risotto in Kitty Hawk; crab stuffed cannelloni in Olympia.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Oregon, a Spanish restaurant serves outrageous octopus and an homage to the chef's childhood; a multitasking market making polenta sandwiches and biscuits and gravy; in New Hampshire, a modern cantina serves belly tacos and a pig's head platter.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: This trip, Guy Fieri uncovers some surprising culinary discoveries; in Columbus, Ohio, a hidden gem tucked away in a grocery store serves out-of-bounds Nepalese-Tibetan specialties.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Denver, homemade Tater Tots, pork rinds and a pastrami sandwich; in Tacoma, pork shoulder tacos, elk sliders and Tater Tots stuffed with parmesan cheese.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's digging into dishes with and without meat; in Mobile, AL, there's rabbit, while in Omaha, NE, a vegan joint brings a meatless spin to fried chicken; in Stamford, CT, Guy and sportscaster Dan Patrick chow down on Greek.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.sub-title: Triple D Nation: Bacon, Burgers and Pork Butt
programme.desc: Guy Fieri grabs seconds of some of the best bacon, burgers and smokin' meats in between; he goes back for smoked bacon meatloaf in Atlanta, competition-style barbecue in Scottsdale, AZ, and a burger with a bologna twist in Fort Worth, TX.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Dishes from real deal to really creative; in Portland, Ore., a 70-year-old icon is serving up authentic Chinese recipes from the chef's hometown; a restaurant in Oklahoma City is cooking chicken and biscuits.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Chicken pot pie; steamed mussels; jambalaya; chargrilled oysters; hot chicken; homemade soups and salads.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy finds clean eats in Sioux Falls, S.D., a 25-ingredient meatloaf in Fairbanks, Alaska, and Midwest mashups in Moorehead, Minn.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri goes from strudel to noodle; in Boulder, Colo., a boho joint serves sweet strudel; Alberta's next-level Nepalese; in Memphis, Tenn., a couple brings big flavor to killer noodles.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri hits up some of the hot spots in Havana, Cuba; house-cured lamb and freshly-caught snapper; goat stew and Chinese fried rice; a cigar-lovers' haven serves up specialties like drunk chicken and pork with plantains.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Washington D.C., knockout dumplings and the bomb ramen; in Atlantic City, cheeseburger pie and chicken vodka; in Colorado Springs, Rocky Mountain roast beef and king-sized cinnamon rolls.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Des Moines, Iowa, unique smoked wings and an apple dumpling dessert; in West Des Moines, an Ecuadorian spot serving chicken with rice and pork with hominy; in Eugene, Ore., fresh caught Dungeness crab and crawfish pie.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is diggin' into all kinds of flavor, starting in Santa Fe, N.M., at a pub serving comfort grub like chicken and biscuits and in-the-shell clam chowder.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's travels with Antonia Lofaso on a culinary journey through Puerto Rico; in Old San Juan, they have a chicken-trifongo combo; a spot in Juncos serves plantain-picadillo lasagna and a stew made with pig's feet.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Atlanta, a funky Asian spot puts out prime-time pork belly and wok-fried chicken; in Vancouver, an elevated diner dishes out duck pancakes and not-your-momma's meatloaf; in Kennewick, Wash., a brewpub pairs pints with house-made sausages.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: A funky Italian joint in Wilmington, Del., serves arancini and veal scaloppini; a Middle Eastern street food spot in San Diego serves shawarma and falafel; a not-your-typical pizza place in Vancouver tops things off with lamb sausage and pig cheeks.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Charlotte, N.C., an eatery tucked inside a beer store serves waffle creations; in Houston, a fusion joint mashes up barbecue with sushi; in Cancun, a beachy spot surprises guests with nurse shark pescadillas and a Mayan fresh-fish specialty.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy gets a helping of comfort food; in Pleasantville, N.J., a local landmark dishes up down-home cooking; in Baltimore, a joint gets decadent with coconut-cream French toast; in Colorado Springs, Colo., a barbecue spot serves up meatloaf.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's finding flavor, starting with a Gainesville, Fla., bagel shop serving carrot-style lox on salted rosemary; then a Baton Rouge, La., joint is chargrilling oysters, and a spot in Naples, Fla., is serving prime-time pastrami.
